nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't there be a space before the "?"?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8809,6 +8809,27 @@ though, and has since been slightly modified)-->
         <example correction="trois fois par semaine">Je joue au Softball <marker>trois fois au semaine</marker>.</example>
       </rule>
       <!-- End of additions -->
+      <rule id="V_LA_ACCENT" name="confusion of bed/bad" default="temp_off">

+              <token postag="V.*2 p" postag_regexp="yes"/>
+              <token>-</token>
+              <token>là</token>
+          </pattern>
+          <message>Vouliez-vous dire <suggestion>\1-la</suggestion>?</message>
